summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 KIOTI 50HP SE HST TRACTOR (NA). THE CONTACT STATED THAT ANTIFREEZE WOULD SPRAY THROUGH THE VENTS WHEN THE AIR CONDITIONER WAS ACTIVATED. AS A RESULT, THE CONTACT REQUIRED MEDICAL ATTENTION. THE TRACTOR WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER, BUT WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE SERIAL NUMBER FOR THE TRACTOR WAS MH2300167. THERE WAS NO VIN AVAILABLE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 270.

FUEL BOWL ENCLOSING THE FUEL FILTER ASSEMBLY IS MADE OF PLASTIC AND IN NORMAL USE HAS DEVELOPED CRACKS WHICH ARE CAUSING THE BOWL TO LEAK CREATING A FIRE HAZARD. THE BOWL HAS A SPRING IN IT WHICH APPLIES PRESSURE TO THE FUEL FILTER KEEPING IT PROPERLY SEATED. THE COMBINATION OF THE PRESSURE, VIBRATION AND SOLVENT ACTIVITY OF THE FUEL HAS CAUSED THE PLASTIC BOWL TO BECOME CRAZED AND CRACKED. IT SHOULD BE REDESIGNED/RECALLED. I AM CURIOUS TO KNOW HOW MANY OTHERS ARE HAVING SIMILAR PROBLEMS.
